hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The Messenger ofAllah sent us young boys of Banu Abdul-Muttalib on donkeys, stalping our things and saying "O my sons, do not stone Jamratulal Aqabah until the sun has risen. (Daif)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ رَمْىِ، جَمْرَةِ الْعَقَبَةِ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Stoning Jamratul 'Aqabah Before Sunrise
